ARABIC: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will be given there a cup to drink mixed with the warmth of ginger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There will they drink a cup flavoured with ginger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therein they shall be served a cup flavoured with ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will drink cups containing (soft flowing) sparkling water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And in Paradise they will be given to drink cups, filled with a mixture of ginger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they will be given to drink there of a cup (of wine) mixed with Zanjabil (ginger),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they shall be made to drink therein a cup the admixture of which shall be ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And therein they shall be given to drink a cup whose mixture is ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There are they watered with a cup whereof the mixture is of Zanjabil,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they will be given a cup to drink flavoured with ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And therein they shall be given to drink of a cup whereof the admixture will be ginger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will be served therein with a cup of a drink seasoned with Zanjabeel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And they will be given to drink there of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Zanjabil,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they will be given to drink there a cup (of wine) mixed with Zanjabil (ginger, etc.),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they shall be given to drink from a cup whose mixture is ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will be served therein with a cup whose flavor is Zanjabeel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:17] And they will be given to drink therein a cup, wine, whose mixture, that with which it is mixed, is ginger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There) in the Garden (are they watered with a cup) of wine (whereof the mixture is of Zanjabil,
